After a 1 hr pulse, diffuse doublet bands corresponding to polypeptides of 79 Kd and 84 Kd were detected intracellularly.
After a 5 hr chase, no gB2 was detected intracellularly, and an 89 Kd polypeptide was detected in the medium. 
The size of the mature, fully glycosylated gB2 secreted into the media of clone pHS210 #3-1 is somewhat smaller than the 100 Kd gB1 secreted by pHS114-6 due to the removal from pHS210 of the coding sequence for 94 amino acids included in the gB1 plasmid.
